title: The One About the N Word
description:
This week Bob & Monét discuss the N word and they continue their "Bye gurl, bye" segment with an interview from Blair St. Clair. Do you love sibling rivalry? Support our podcast by going to our patreon page, there you’ll find exclusive content and have the ability to support our show. https://www.patreon.com/siblingrivalrypodcast --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/siblingrvalry/support
